Text: While not directly correlated to class size, lower divisors mean more teachers, which ultimately lowers class sizes, Mackey said. Lowering the divisors will cost $139.5 million, Mackey said.
Cause: While not directly correlated to class size, lower divisors mean more teachers, which ultimately lowers class sizes, Mackey said.
Effect: Lowering the divisors will cost $139.5 million, Mackey said.
Sentence: <e1>While not directly correlated to class size, lower divisors mean more teachers, which ultimately lowers class sizes, Mackey said.</e1> <e2>Lowering the divisors will cost $139.5 million, Mackey said.</e2>
